metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37305 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the ProofreadPage (aka Proofread Page) extension for MediaWiki through 1.39.3. In includes/Page/PageContentHandler.php and includes/Page/PageDisplayHandler.php, hidden users can be exposed via public interfaces.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
